name: Root Manager
description: - Root Manager is a Root Android Explorer, the ultimate file manager for root users.  - Extract APK files, uninstall APK files - Transfer files with FTP Server - Access your home PC: Through your smartphone via WiFi with SMB - It helps you to access the whole of androids file system including the elusive data folder, cache,... - Access, edit, create, change, copy files including system files. - Zip, unzip, tar, untar files. - View SQLite databases, run script files, explore zip, tar , rar files. - Encrypt, decrypt file with AES256 algorithm. - View file information such as size, md5, edited time,.. - Change owner, group of files, folders. - Create shortcut for file, folder...
